result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on November 30, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

No contact directly or indirectly with victim CJ or ET, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact w/ co defendant Courtney Campton. No contact with the Janesville Public Library.

3:06 PM Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Devan James Chidester. Defense argues for bond modification. State objects with argument. Court modifies bond to $1000 Signature Bond with conditions: No contact directly or indirectly with victim CJ or ET, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact w/ co defendant Courtney Campton. No contact with the Hedberg Public Library. Matter to be set.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report

10:52 AM Prosecuting attorney Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Devan James Chidester. Officer Jacob Seuferer sworn in and testified by video. Witness identified Defendant. State moves for bind over, Defense objects without argument. Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendant pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.
Preliminary hearing on August 1, 2022 at 10:45 am.

4:18 PM Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Cuco Longoria appeared by video on behalf of C. James Fitzgerald for Devan James Chidester. Preliminary Hearing requested within time limits.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 10:45 am.

03:07 PM Prosecuting attorney Gerald Anthony Urbik and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Devan James Chidester. No attorney appointed yet.Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

03:33 PM Defendant Devan James Chidester in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Taylor E Klokow by video.  Mason C Braunschweig and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Court orders $500 Cash bond with conditions: No contact directly or indirectly with victim CJ or ET, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact w/ co defendant Courtney Campton. No contact with the exterior of Hedberg Public Library, may only be on premises to go in or out of building.
